ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] RE: Network setup help
ygData.msgSnippet: hey can I ask if you have Luclin and use the new ui? If so, can you tell me the Amount of Ram in the system, the video ram, and the bus speed if you happen to
ygData.messageBody:
hey can I ask if you have Luclin and use the new ui?
If so, can you tell me the Amount of Ram in the
system, the video ram, and the bus speed if you happen
to know it.

the reason I ask is I bought a new machine Intel
Celeron 1.2Ghz processor with over 300 MB ram and
Nvidia 32MB ram card. The game runs ok but I can't use
the new UI else I get Mouse lag or hesitation like
MAD.

And when spells are cast, the mouse is VERY slow.
the graphics are fine though and actually run smooth.
I have about 15 Luclin graphic images turned on.

Let me know

Thanks

--- Kuervodr@... wrote:
> This might be a little late, heh. I just got my P4
> 1.8ghz system in the other day and have been busy
> playing with that. EQ runs awesome on it too.
> Anyway, now I'm playing catch-up on the e-mails....
>
>
>
> Very good suggestions from the others. I haven't
> seen an answer if those worked for you or not. If it
> did, great! If not tho, you might want to head on
> over to the EQ tech forums, as this topic has been
> brought up lots of times over there, and do a search
> of that forum for "linksys" or something similar.
> You should come up with a number of threads you can
> read through for various possible solutions. Good
> luck!
>
>
http://boards.station.sony.com/ubb/everquest/cgi-bin/forumdisplay.cgi?action=topics&forum=Technical+Help&number=3&DaysPrune=20&LastLogin=
>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "Ariaya" <ariaya@...>
> To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
> Sent: Sunday, August 11, 2002 10:20 PM
> Subject: [EverQuest] Network setup help
>
>
> > Hi,
> >
> > I'm hoping that someone on this board can help. I
> just installed an
> > at home network with an ethernet DSL modem, 2
> computers and a LinkSys
> > router (with switch built in).
> >
> > For some reason, the router seems to be making me
> disconnect from EQ
> > VERY frequently! 9 or 10 times a night!!
> >
> > I unplugged the router and just plugged the
> computer into the modem
> > and everything worked.
> >
> > Any suggestions on how I can get this network
> going?
>
>
>
